edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight

Class WeightLearningApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaxMargin, MetropolisRandOM, SliceRandOM, VotedPerceptron

    public abstract class WeightLearningApplication
extends java.util.Observable
implements ModelApplication
    Abstract class for learning the weights of CompatibilityKernels in a Model from data.

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIG_PREFIX

        public static final java.lang.String CONFIG_PREFIX
        Prefix of property keys used by this class.
        See Also:
        ConfigManager, Constant Field Values

      • REASONER_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String REASONER_KEY
        Key for Factory or String property.

        Should be set to a ReasonerFactory or the fully qualified name of one. Will be used to instantiate a Reasoner.

        This reasoner will be used when constructing ground models for weight learning, unless this behavior is overriden by a subclass.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REASONER_DEFAULT

        public static final ReasonerFactory REASONER_DEFAULT
        Default value for REASONER_KEY.

        Value is instance of ADMMReasonerFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • learn

        public void learn()
           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                  java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                  java.lang.InstantiationException
        Learns new weights.

        The RandomVariableAtoms in the distribution are those persisted in the random variable Database when this method is called. All RandomVariableAtoms which the Model might access must be persisted in the Database.

        Each such RandomVariableAtom should have a corresponding ObservedAtom in the observed Database, unless the subclass implementation supports latent variables.

        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        See Also:
        DatabasePopulator
